name: Dice Brawl (TwoEuroWineProduction)
description:
Dice Brawl is a short 2D action game, where you let the dice decide how your fight will look. Roll the dice to select your opponent, your magic element and even you battle track! Will you be able to be victorious? Glory awaits you in your next round of Dice Brawl!

Controls: you can use "A" & "D" to move and jump with "Space" or "W". to cast your magic spell press "Enter" or the left mouse Button.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

And now step into the Arena, but don't forget to...

Credits: art and code were made by us during this jam, for music and font credits, check Licenses.zip, the used sound effects were made by simon13666
